title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 108.1 - Introductory
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 108.1 - Introductory

State Regulations

For the purpose of establishing uniformity in classifications of expenses of property/casualty insurers recorded in statements and reports filed with and statistics reported to the Superintendent of Insurance, all such authorized insurers which are subject to the provisions of article 23 of the Insurance Law shall observe the rules set forth below. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11
ยง
108.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
